amendment.description: An amendment numbered 93 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce to $1 the salary of the Director of the Office of Compliance a the FDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 270 (Roll no. 425).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 270 (Roll no. 425).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
